description: PRIMUS is an international multidisciplinary project funded by ESA that aims to substantially advance our existing understanding on the link between net primary production (NPP) and wind-forced upwelling in Atlantic Eastern Boundary Upwelling Systems (EBUS), through combining Earth Observation (EO) data obtained from satellite remote sensing, with upwelling and climate indices, data collected in-situ, and ocean circulation modelling.PRIMUS aims to make a major contribution to the ESA 4DAtlantic research programme, 4D reconstructions and understanding of Atlantic EBUS net primary production in relation to upwelling and its socio-economic impacts.
title: 4DATLANTIC EBUS PRIMUS
osc:name: 4DATLANTIC EBUS PRIMUS

contacts.name: Portuguese Institute for Sea and Atmosphere (IPMA) (PT)
University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria  ULPGC (ES)
